posts.post_title: SOLD!!! FS: T206 HOF FRED CLARKE PORTRAIT! SGC w/ "DOUBLE NAME"!
posts.post_content:
SOLD


10-19: REDUCED TO $169 DELIVERED!


SGC 40 VG 3! PIEDMONT 150/25

This is a TREMENDOUS EXAMPLE of HOFer FRED CLARKE, outfielder for the PITTSBURG PIRATES. Featuring a DEEP, RICH RED BACKGROUND w/ NICE LARGE WHITE BORDERS & UNEQUALED FOCUS & COLOR CONTRAST! CORNERS ARE SQUARED.  A HALL of FAME QUALITY card, w/ the SCARCE "DOUBLE NAME" TOP & BOTTOM!!

Sell for $189 w/ FREE SHIPPING & INSURANCE!

For those not familiar w/ my T206's, here is the interesting provenance.
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=t206[/url]


My T206's are ESSENTIALLY 1-OWNER cards--they were stored by the relative until I bought them.
1st boost! A HOF Clarke T206 in seldom-found condition!
